name: 'Bowlicious' leather clutch bag with bow detail.
description:
The Bowlicious Clutch bag, designed and handmade by Cottonarts. 
A generous sized, original 'Bowlicious' clutch handmade using soft, supple leather with a statement bow. The bow is also designed so that you can slip your hand right through and under, making it comfortable to hold whilst showing off your statement bow.

This innovative clutch bag is one of the strongest, most influential designs to date, giving Cottonarts that sharp edge in today's alternative fashion world.

All bags have a zip and magnetic snap closure, perfect to keep all your bits extra safe. 
If you would like a different colour combination please contact me with your requirements.

Once ordered your 'Bowlicious' will be handmade posted out within 5 working days. I aim to have your clutch with you within 7 working days once ordered.

'Tank Girl' is a fun and adventurous rucksack design full of imagination, attitude and spirit. These one-off original rucksacks are both practical and easy wearing with either a flash of colour or a mixture of textures and earthy colour tones. 

This Rucksack has leather detailing on the flap and quirky brass rivets.

This androgynous collection is heavily influenced by individuality, punk visual art and music culture.Each 'Tank Girl' Rucksack is handmade using tough, hard wearing fabrics such as canvas and denim with re-enforced adjustable straps.

Once ordered your 'Tank Girl' will be handmade and posted out within 7 working days. If you have a question regarding time scale, please contact me and I will do my best to meet your demand.

name: 'Bowlicious' Punk girl clash - Clutch bag
description:
The Bowlicious Clutch bag, designed and handmade by Cottonarts. 
A generous sized, original 'Bowlicious' handmade using soft, supple blue leather with a statement bow embellished with clashing pink animal print. The bow is also designed so that you can slip your hand right through and under, making it comfortable to hold whilst showing off your statement bow.

This innovative clutch bag is one of the strongest, most influential designs to date, giving Cottonarts that sharp edge in today's alternative fashion world.

All bags have a zip and magnetic snap closure, perfect to keep all your bits extra safe. 
If you would like a different colour combination please contact me with your requirements.

Once ordered your 'Bowlicious' will be handmade posted out within 5 working days. I aim to have your clutch with you within 7 working days once ordered. 
If you have a question regarding time scale, please contact me and I will do my best to meet your demand.

name: 'Shutterbug' Fabric Satchel - Mixed detail
description:
An original 'Shutterbug' satchel by Cottonarts, Available in three different designs. We have a neutral grey with a quirky bicycle photograph, a colourful check with a fun monkey face and cross detail and lastly another vibrant options featuring a punk girl. (later two have extra zipped pocket)

These generous bags have a deep gusset and adjustable, re-enforced straps.

The 'Shutterbug' collection adds further facets to an ever evolving work design ethos. Featuring passionately shot film and digital work, this groundbreaking collection of handmade bags explore the beautiful eccentricities of day to day life through the photographic medium.
